name: star_anchor_program
description: Honorary Quote Fee program for Meteora DAMM pools with Streamflow integration

scripts.test:quick: npm run validator & sleep 5 && npm test && pkill -f solana-test-validator
scripts.setup:programs: mkdir -p programs/damm-v2 programs/streamflow && solana program dump 675kPX9MHTjS2zt1qfr1NYHuzeLXfQM9H24wFSUt1Mp8 programs/damm-v2/damm_v2.so --url mainnet-beta && solana program dump strmRqUCoQUgGUan5YhzUZa6KqdzwX5L6FpUxfmKg5m programs/streamflow/streamflow.so --url mainnet-beta

author: Anurag Tiwari
